question: Which of the following kings helped Wang-hiuen-tse in defeating king Arjuna of Kanauj?
explanation: Srong-Tsan Gampo was the ruler of Tibet when Wang-hiuen-tse escaped to Nepal. He gave 7,000 horses to Wang-hiuen-tse. King Bhaskara-varman of Kamrupa also helped Wang-hiuen-tse in defeating Arjuna. He was defeated and taken prisoner by Wang-hiuen-tse.
